name: Armored Front
description:
Armored Front was inspired by reading WW2 tank memoirs, watching countless WW2 documentaries and trying to understand what it was like to be Tanker during WW2. While it is a VR centered tank game that incorporates best of action, simulator and RPG game elements, and it is designed with historical accuracy in mind. You will play as the crew of "X34-85" prototype tank during World War 2, in the Eastern Front participating in multiple types of missions and operate, upgrade, and maintain your tank.Current Features
  • T34-85 inspired prototype tank that can be operated and maintained using VR interactions
  • Interactively manipulate controls using a VR controller
  • Interactive environment
  • Tank Systems: Weapons, Electrical, Fuel, Drivetrain, Armor
  • Take the role of Commander, Gunner, Radio Operator and Loader by switching to each station
  • Realistic gun operation: Load and fire cannons, heavy machine guns, fixed weapons
Upcoming Features
  • Career mode: unlock new abilities, skills, and ranks
  • Garage: Repair, upgrade, and perform maintenance on the engine, tracks, weapons AND customize accessories such as external weapons and improvised armor
  • Barracks: Player customization, storage, manage crew
  • Armory: purchase firearms, ammunition, and equipment
  • Day/Night cycle and weather systems: elemental effects that may affect tank operation
  • Realistic operation of firearms from WW2 era
  • Character customization with full body perspective
  • Voice Commands: give orders to your crew with voice commands
  • Game controller support: e.g. steering wheels and foot pedals
  • In VR mission editor: Edit missions interactively without having to leave the VR environment and share with friends on Steam Workshop
  • Steam Achievements and Collectable items: War memorabilia and items that may be used in game
  • Add more content: Maps, missions, additional playable vehicles, game play modes

Potential Features to be Explored
  • Partial Mod support
  • More weapons
  • More playable vehicles
  • Fatigue Mechanics: Crew gets tired, hungry and fatigued
  • Steam trading cards
Far Future possibilities
  • In VR Map Creator: Create completely new environments by editing maps within VR
  • Large "open world" type maps
  • Co-op Multiplayer support
